description_txt: stated on August 19, 2008 in Orlando, Fla.:
quote_txt: "Sen. McCain was already turning his sights to Iraq just days after 9/11, and he became a leading supporter of an invasion and occupation of (Iraq)."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2008 in his book The Obama Nation. :
quote_txt: Barack Obama "openly supported (opposition leader) Raila Odinga during his visit to Africa in 2006."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2008 in his book The Obama Nation. :
quote_txt: Barack Obama "rejects everyone white, including his mother and his grandparents."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2008 in his book The Obama Nation. :
quote_txt: Barack Obama has "pledged to reduce the size of the military."

description_txt: stated on August 16, 2008 in Saddleback Valley Community Church in Orange County, Calif.:
quote_txt: "It (Georgia) was one of the earliest Christian nations. The king of then-Georgia in the third century converted to Christianity."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2008 in a widely circulated chain e-mail.:

description_txt: stated on August 14, 2008 in a town hall in Aspen, Colo.:
quote_txt: The musical Mamma Mia! has "been selling out for years."

description_txt: stated on July 30, 2008 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: McCain's attacks on Obama are 'not true,' 'false,' 'baloney,' according to media outlets.

description_txt: stated on August 9, 2008 in a television ad:
quote_txt: John McCain worries about nuclear waste in Arizona, but not in Nevada.

description_txt: stated on August 9, 2008 in a statement by Obama spokesman Hari Sevugan :

description_txt: stated on August 13, 2008:

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2008 in a television ad:

description_txt: stated on August 11, 2008 in a speech in Las Vegas:

description_txt: stated on August 11, 2008 in an Internet ad:

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2008 in a radio ad:

description_txt: stated on August 11, 2008 in a television ad:

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2008 in in a radio ad.:

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2008 in a town hall in Berea, Ohio.:
quote_txt: Fully inflating tires is "a step that every expert says would absolutely reduce our oil consumption by 3 to 4 percent."

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2008 in in a television ad.:

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2008 in a news release:

quote_txt: Spending increases, not tax cuts, are the major cause of the federal budget deficit.
